title: EzyDB
desc: A lightweight, file-based NoSQL database built for Python developers.
Offers fast read/write performance with zero external dependencies.
Ideal for small-scale projects, prototyping, or learning database concepts.

title: DarkEST
desc: A super dark Visual Studio Code theme designed for night-time development.
Minimizes eye strain with deep contrast and elegant syntax highlighting.
Includes custom styling for all major file types and UI components.

title: Pip Creator
desc: A CLI tool that simplifies the creation of Python pip packages.
Automatically sets up directory structure, `setup.py`, and metadata files.
Ideal for beginners who want to publish their first Python library.

title: Code Editor
desc: A simple, lightweight in-browser code editor built with vanilla JS.
Supports HTML, CSS, and JS preview with real-time updates.
Perfect for quick prototyping or educational use.

title: Markdown Editor
desc: A minimal markdown editor that renders live preview as you type.
Clean UI for distraction-free writing and formatting.
Built using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: MonoCipher
desc: Implements a simple monoalphabetic substitution cipher in Python.
Provides functionality for both encryption and decryption.
Great for learning classical encryption techniques.
